Translations.Text: He is the One who created you from dust, then from a fertilized egg, then from a (dangling, clinging, and leach like) blood clot, then He brings you out as a baby, then (He lets) you reach your full maturity (and strength), then you become old while some of you die before that, so that you reach a defined period, and that you may understand
He is the One who gives life and causes death, and when He decides on an issue, then He just says for it: be, and it will be
Did you not see how those who argue about God's signs are turned away (from the truth)
Those who denied the book and what We sent Our messengers with it, they will know
when the shackles and the chains are around their necks and they are dragged
into the boiling water, then they are burned in the fire
Then it is said to them: where are what you were associating (as partners)
besides God? They say: they abandoned us, rather we were not calling on anything in the past. That is how God misguides the disbelievers
That is because you used to rejoice unjustifiably (and excessively) on the earth, and because you used to exuberate
Enter gates of hell, remaining in there forever, and what a bad place for the arrogant ones
So persevere (and be patient), indeed Godâ€™s promise is true. And whether We show you some of that which We promised them (the punishment) or We make you die (before that), they are returned to Us
